resources.string: Discover expertly curated experiences in London

From the most desirable fine dining Restaurants in London to unique experiences, family outings and taxi bookings, you can now plan and book a range of experiences directly from comfort of your hotel or serviced apartment.
Enjoy using podd for a memorable stay in London.
Going Somewhere? Book a secure taxi or limousine

Instantly discover London in a whole new way at the touch of a button through your complimentary in-room tablet.
We have partnered with some of the leading service providers in London to enable you to discover and book a range of exciting experiences.\nWe hope to make your stay in London a truly memorable one.
In summary, your tablet gives you instant access to:

- The best tables at more than 50 Michelin restaurants
 - Casual dining experiences and 'hidden gems' curated by our expert team
 - Meals delivered straight to your door anytime of the day or night
 - Gift and hampers available from carefully selected partners, available for delivery anywhere in the United Kingdom or worldwide
 - Taxi on demand or in advance from our selected partner (Hailo)
 - Secure airport luggage transfers via Airpotr to any of London's major airports as well as instant check-ins through British Airways
 - London's best attractions including theatres, museums and art galleries
 - The leading fitness classes, health clubs and spas near you
We would love to hear from you! Contact us with any questions or feedback at hello@poddapp.com

Disclaimer: This platform is owned and operated by podd Technologies (podd). podd is in no way affiliated with the serviced apartment or hotel hosting this tablet nor is podd in anyway affiliated with the service providers listed on the tablet. While we constantly strive to maintain the highest possible standards and experiences on our platform, we do not accept responsibility should any of the services listed fail to meet your expectations.However we would welcome your feedback regarding these issues.
Going somewhere, book a secure taxi
Going somewhere? BOOK a secure taxi
TRAVEL BAG-FREE TO ANY LONDON AIRPORT

Free yourself of burdensome baggage and make the most of your last day in London.

Airportr, the premium luggage delivery and storage service will collect your bag from your apartment or hotel and deliver them securely to any London airport at an agreed time, ready for you to collect and check-in.

Indicative price for this option is Â£20 for the first bag and Â£10 for each additional bag (any size or weight).

Airportr has partnered with British Airways to enable you check-in remotely from your apartment.

Not only do you travel bag-free to the airport, you also get to dash straight through security without the hassle of airport check-in.

Indicative price for this option is Â£30 for the first bag and Â£10 for each additional bag (British Airways baggage restrictions apply).

Please proceed below if you would like to receive a quote from Airportr

Prices dependent on pick up location and departing airport (minimum booking time periods apply) e.g. collection from Central London locations to Heathrow, Gatwick and City cost just Â£20 for the first bag + Â£10 each additional bag (any size or weight) NB: AirPortr + Bag Check-In exclusive to British Airways passengers cost Â£30 for the first bag + Â£10 each additional bag (as per passenger allowance)
